## Source: amazon-inspector (d8cd5885ca66abe264124578aa99aaeb2907923a26681d5b64e8d6b72cb72696)
The package remark-parse10 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (84306852bbfaa80196c0fdf7e4227b3f5b4dad54a05e1ba37b60a711bc1be39f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'remark-parse10' @ 10.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
